House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08109
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROHIBITING THE USE OF CHLORINE IN ALL FISHING ACTIVITIES AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE SECTION 92 OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10654 AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Includes the use of chlorine among the ban fishing activity, aside from explosives, poisonous substance or electricity.
